page.title: 05TRANSPORT AROUND OSSINGTON.
page.content: Most of the families in the block own their own{transport,}for example a {car}or{motorcycle,}some even have two or more vehicles in order for them to travel around. The{bus service}is most inadequate only{two buses per week}to and from {Newark,}which is approximately nine miles away, therefore some means of personal transport is necessary if a person needs to travel out of the area. However the education authority ensures that there is essential {transport}for{school children. There are no major roads in this block, the few that are there are minor country roads.
